notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: A.A. performed the simulations, contributed to the analysis of data, and contributed in writing some parts of the paper. S.K.M. conceived the idea, designed the work and numerical experiments, led the analysis, contributed to the writing, and oversaw the work. S.S. contributed to the analysis and cowrote the paper. M.B. helped in interpretation of the results and co-wrote the paper. J.S.R. contributed to the simulations and analysis of the data. S.K.D. contributed in writing the paper.
